game - package game
 
GameData - Class in engine
Class that groups together all core runtime data of a game session.
GameData(LinkedQueue<Player>, ArrayUnorderedList<Player>, ArrayUnorderedList<Enigma>, Dificuldade) - Constructor for class engine.GameData
Creates a new GameData instance with all core game components.
GameEngine - Class in engine
Core game engine that controls the main loop, player turns, movement, puzzles enigmas, levers, traps and victory detection.
GameEngine(LabyrinthGraph<Divisao>, GameView) - Constructor for class engine.GameEngine
Creates a new GameEngine instance bound to a given labyrinth graph and view.
GameExporter - Class in io
Responsible for exporting a GameReport to a JSON file.

Creates a new GameExporter

Handles the initial game setup.

Represents the summary of GameReport
GameReport() - Constructor for class io.GameReport
Creates an empty GameReport with an empty player list
GameReport.EnigmaEvent - Class in io
Represents a single enigma interaction for a player: the room where it occurred, the question, the answer, whether it was solved and the effect applied.
GameReport.PlayerReport - Class in io
Class that stores all information about a single player in a game.
